messages.message: Hi all, just a tip for debugging flow runs on prod: since most of us are not site admins now on flow dashboard you’ll likely not able to see other people’s flow runs anymore. If you need someone to help debug your flow, you can still share the flow run by 1) giving that person access to your output folder and 2) share with them a link to your batch.ibflowresult file.

Any chance there’s an acl that allows us to see other runs in flow dashboard? This feature was very useful, especially debugging for people in other timezones. All good if not — sharing repos works too :blush:
Yeah I’m considering that too…. Will need to look at resourcing. Meanwhile this is a workaround for now.
